title: Game.of.Thrones.S06E02.PROPER.HDTV.x264-BATV[mp4remuxer].mp4
description:
BATV MKV to MP4 remux.

From BATV's NFO as to why this is a PROPER:

FLEET use a non-standard muxer that is creating files which breach the specification, creating playback issues on some demuxers.
Mostly hardware based ones like certain Samsung TVs.
Due to incorrect time-basing playback issues arise, creating a VFR like effect of studders, crashes and freezes.

__________


Notes about [mp4remuxer]

 1. This remuxing is focused on SD (approx. 400p) HDTV or Web-DL captures that have begun coming out as MKVs instead of MP4s, even though the audio and video streams inside those MKVs are standard/typical streams for MP4s.
 2. The change to MKVs for these SD HDTV captures causes problems for many people and their devices (for no logical reason).
 3. I will remux and share things I want to, I do not plan to be a comprehensive remux dumper of everything out there.
 4. If you want to share such remuxes, add your own tag or feel free to use the same tag I am using making those of us who use the [mp4remuxer] tag only affiliated in that we are doing the same thing and it is a tag that makes the nature of these torrent very clear to all
